press.title: Bohatisi
press.contactLine: Bakeng sa lipotso tsa mecha ea litaba, iteanye le rona ho
press.boilerplateBody: Chatforia ke app ea melaetsa e shebaneng le lekunutu e nolofatsang puisano ea lipuo tse fapaneng. Melaetsa e sirelelitsoe ka pheletso-ho-pheletso ka boiketsetso, ‚Äôme phetolelo e hahelletsoeng e ts‚Äôehetsa lipuo tse 100+ ka nako ea nnete. Basebelisi ba ka bulela melaetsa e nyamelang, ba boloka li-receipt tsa ho bala e le boikhethelo, ‚Äôme ba sinka lisebelisoa. E fumaneha ho iOS, Android le wepeng.
press.assetsSubtitle: Lologo, linepe tsa skrine, le lit≈°oant≈°o tsa sehlahisoa.
press.scanTip: Ho desktop? Skena ka fono ea hao ho jarolla app.

careers.title: Menyetla ea Mosebetsi
careers.intro: Re sehlopha se senyenyane se hahang molaetsa o poraefete, oa lefats‚Äôe. Haeba u tsotella encryption, phihlello, le UX e monate, re ka rata ho utloa ho uena.
careers.openRoles: Mosebetsi o bulehileng: Boenjiniere (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Sehlahisoa, T≈°ehetso.
careers.apply: Tsela ea ho etsa kopo: Romella CV/lihokelo ho jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Ka Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ke molaetsa o sireletsehileng, oa lipuo tse ngata, o nang le encryption ea pheletso-ho-pheletso, phetolelo hang-hang, le mehala ea lentsoe/video. Morero oa rona o bonolo: ho thusa batho ho hokahana‚Äîka mokhoa o sireletsehileng, o poraefete, le ho pholletsa le lipuo.

values.access: <bold>Phihlello bakeng sa bohle:</bold> Phetolelo ea lipuo tse 100+ ka bohona.
values.control: <bold>Taolo:</bold> Melaetsa e nyamelang & li-receipt tsa ho bala ke boikhethelo.
values.privacy_aria: Lekunutu pele: E2E encryption ka boiketsetso.
values.access_aria: Phihlello bakeng sa bohle: Phetolelo ea lipuo tse 100+ ka bohona.
values.control_aria: Taolo: Melaetsa e nyamelang le li-receipt tsa ho bala ke boikhethelo.

about.howDescription: Melaetsa e sireletsoa sesebelisoa sa hau pele e tloha. Phetolelo, li-bekapo le sink li etselitsoe ho fokotsa seo li-server tsa rona li ka se bonang.

advertise.title: Beha Papatso ka Chatforia
advertise.description: Fihlella basebelisi ba melaetsa ka lipapatso tse hlomphehang, tse sireletsehileng bakeng sa let≈°oao. Re fana ka libaka tsa banner, bot≈°epehi, le li-promo tsa ka tlung. Bareki ba Premium ha ba bone lipapatso.

adsense.withPubId: Hajoale re fana ka lipapatso ka Google AdSense. Haeba u ka rata ho re lebisa ka Google Ads, sebelisa ID ea mohoebi {{pubId}} ‚Äôme u kope managed placement lihloohong tse ka tlase. Bot≈°epehi bo tobileng boa teng‚Äîsebelisa foromo.
adsense.noPubId: Hajoale re fana ka lipapatso ka Google AdSense. Bot≈°epehi bo tobileng bo boetse boa fumaneha‚Äîsebelisa foromo e ka tlase.

advertise.noPlacements: Ha ho libaka tse hlophisitsoeng hajoale. Kenya ho ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Makhetlo a mangata a ho kenya & nako e telele ea ho lula ka har‚Äôa UI ea moqoqo
why.brandSafe: Mefuta e sireletsehileng bakeng sa let≈°oao; ho fokotsa khafetsa ka tlhompho
why.sponsoredMoments: Linako tse t≈°ehetsoang (mohl., ‚ÄúStart a Chat‚Äù modal) lia fumaneha
why.deals: Likonteraka tse tobileng kapa ka lenaneo ka AdSense/Google Ads

gettingStarted.title: Ho Qala
gettingStarted.subtitle: O mocha ho Chatforia? Tataiso ena e potlakileng e bont≈°a tsa bohlokoa hore u be le katleho ka metsotso.

alert.text: Tataiso ena e tla hola ha re tsebisa likarolo tse ncha. Haeba ho haella ho hong, re tsebise ka

section1.title: 1) Etsa ak‚Äôhaonte
section1.loginText: ka ak‚Äôhaonte eo u seng u e-na le eona.

section2.title: 2) Qala melaetsa
section2.item1: Etsa DM kapa Sehlopha ‚Äôme u romele molaetsa oa hau oa pele.
section2.item2: Sebelisa phetolelo hang-hang ho qoqa ka lipuo tse 100+.
section2.item3: Leka melaetsa e nyamelang le li-receipt tsa ho bala ho Profaele ‚Üí Lekunutu.

section3.title: 3) E-ea pele
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = ha ho lipapatso, Premium = likarolo tsohle).
section3.item2Part1: Hokela lisebelisoa tse ling ‚Äôme u sebetse li-bekapo tse sirelelitsoeng ho

account.q: Ke etsa kapa ke khutlisa ak‚Äôhaonte joang?
account.a: Jarolla app kapa sebelisa web, tobetsa ‚ÄúEtsa ak‚Äôhaonte‚Äù, netefatsa imeile/mohala. Ho khutlisa, sebelisa ‚ÄúU lebetse phasewete‚Äù.

privacy.q: Na melaetsa e sirelelitsoe ka pheletso-ho-pheletso?
privacy.a: E. Melaetsa le mehala li sirelelitsoe ka E2E ka boiketsetso. Ke uena le moamoheli feela ba ka li balang.

translate.a: Buletsa ‚ÄúAuto-translate‚Äù ho Litlhophiso ‚Üí Ponahalo & Puo. Re fetolela sesebelisoa se ts‚Äôehetsang, ho seng joalo ka API tse sireletsehileng ka metadata e fokolang.

contact.a: Re fihlele ho support@chatforia.com. Kenya li-skrinshot le mofuta oa app.

contact.title: Iteanye le Rona
contact.successMsg: Kea leboha‚Äîsehlopha sa rona se tla araba ka imeile.
contact.errorSend: Ha e a khona ho romela. Ka kopo imeile support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Leano lena la Lekunutu le hlalosa kamoo Chatforia (‚Äúre‚Äù, ‚Äúrona‚Äù) e bokellang, e sebelisang le ho arolelana tlhaiso-leseling ha u sebelisa li-app le lit≈°ebeletso tsa rona. Re rala Chatforia ho fokotsa data eo re ka e fumanang.

infoWeCollect.title: Tlhahisoleseding eo re e bokellang
infoWeCollect.account: Tlhahisoleseding ea ak‚Äôhaonte (mohl., imeile/mohala) ho etsa le ho sireletsa ak‚Äôhaonte.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Litaba tse sirelelitsoeng (melaetsa/mehala) li sirelelitsoe ka E2E; re ke ke ra li bala.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Tsebo ea tekheniki/ts‚Äôebeliso joalo ka log tsa ho senyeha, mofuta oa sesebelisoa, kapa analytics e akaretsang ho ntlafatsa ts'ebetso.

howWeUse.title: Kamoo re sebelisang tlhahisoleseding
howWeUse.provide: Ho fana le ho sireletsa t≈°ebeletso (auth, ho lemoha spam/tlhekefetso).
howWeUse.improve: Ho ntlafatsa likarolo (boleng ba phetolelo, ts‚Äôepahalo).

sharing.title: Kabo
sharing.body: Ha re rekise data ea botho. Re ka arolelana data e lekanyelitsoeng le ba sebetsetsang (mohl., tsebiso ka push, analytics) tlas‚Äôa likonteraka tse tiileng.

rights.title: Litokelo tsa hau
rights.body: Ho latela sebaka sa heno (mohl., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), u ka kopa ho fihlella, ho lokisa, ho hlakola, kapa ho itokolla mefuteng e itseng ea ts'ebetso. Imeile: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Polokelo ea data & t≈°ireletseho
retention.body: Re boloka feela se hlokahalang ho sebetsa t≈°ebeletso ‚Äôme re sebelisa t≈°ireletseho ea maemo a indasteri. Litaba tsa E2E ha re khone ho li bula.

children.title: Bana
children.body: Chatforia ha e etsetsoe bana ba ka tlase ho 13 (kapa ho latela molao oa heno).

changes.title: Liphetoho
changes.body: Re tla beha lintlafatso mona ‚Äôme re nchafatse letsatsi la ‚ÄúE ntlafalitsoe la ho qetela‚Äù.

intro.body: Ka ho sebelisa Chatforia u amohela Lipehelo tsena. Haeba u sa li amohele, se sebelise t≈°ebeletso.

accounts.title: Liak‚Äôhaonte
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Fana ka tlhahisoleseding e nepahetseng ‚Äôme u boloke mangolo a patlo a sireletsehile.
accounts.itemResponsibility: U ikarabella bakeng sa se etsahalang ak‚Äôhaonteng ea hau.

acceptableUse.title: T≈°ebeliso e amohelehang
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Se ke oa romella litaba tse seng molaong, tse tlhekefetsang, kapa tse hatellang litokelo; ha ho spam kapa tlhekefetso e iketsang.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Re ka emisa/khutlisa t≈°ebeletso ka lebaka la tlolo.

yourContent.title: Litaba tsa hau
yourContent.body: U boloka litokelo holim‚Äôa litaba tsa hau. U re fa litokelo tse hlokahalang ho sebetsa t≈°ebeletso (mohl., ho tsamaisa, polokelo, phetolelo).

disclaimer.title: Litemoso & boikarabelo
disclaimer.body: T≈°ebeletso e fuoa ‚Äújoalo ka e le teng‚Äù ntle le liwaranti. Ho ea ka molao, Chatforia ha e ikarabelle ka t≈°enyo e sa tobang kapa e bakoang ke maemo.

changes.title: Liphetoho
changes.body: Re ka ntlafatsa lipehelo tsena; t≈°ebeliso e tsoelang pele ka mor‚Äôa lintlafatso e bolela kamohelo.

doNotSell.title: Se Rekise kapa Se Arolelane Tlhahisoleseding ea Ka
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ha e rekise tlhahisoleseding ea botho. Leha ho le joalo, baahi ba California ba ka romella lik≈çpo tlas‚Äôa CPRA ba sebelisa konopo e ka tlase.

cookies.title: Litlhophiso tsa Li-cookie
cookies.body: Chatforia e sebelisa li-cookie tse fokolang (mohl., session, t≈°ireletseho). Ha re sebelise li-cookie tsa lipapatso tsa batho ba bang. Laola li-cookie ka litlhophiso tsa sebatli sa hau.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Ha ho nomoro e abetsoeng. Khetha ka khoutu ea sebaka ho qala ho romela melaetsa.

accessibilitySettings.title: Phihlello & Litemoso
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Likhetho tsa ho etsa Chatforia hore e be bonolo ntle le ho it≈°etleha ka modumo.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: E qala ka boholo bo tloaelehileng. Eketsa haeba u rata mongolo o moholo ho litlhophiso tsa phihlello.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Litemoso tsa pono bakeng sa melaetsa & mehala
Bont≈°a libaner le ho phatsima ha sehlooho e le hore u se ke oa fetoa ke mesebetsi.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Driba ha ho na melaetsa e mecha (ha e t≈°ehetsoa)
Hlahisa dribolo ea sesebelisoa ka litemoso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Khant≈°a skrine ha ho kena mohala
Khanya e khanyang hanyenyane ha mohala o lla.

Fetolela melaetsa ea lentsoe ka bohona
Kenya tlhaloso ho melaetsa ea audio eo u e amohelang.

error.premiumRequired: Ketso ena e hloka moralo oa Premium.
